verbs.description: A Republican strategist leapt to the defense of President Donald Trump [V: following] [ARG2: comments made by former FBI Director James Comey at the weekend] .
A Republican strategist leapt to the defense of President Donald Trump following [ARG1: comments] [V: made] [ARG0: by former FBI Director James Comey] [ARGM-TMP: at the weekend] .
